Date: Monday, 6/2/1993
Subject: Progress of Matt Mantei
Dear Sir,
Matt Mantei is doing pretty good at AA Arkansas Travelers!
He has an ERA of 1.24, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
